snippet: The mistrial in the John Edwards case was the second time this year that a highly visible prosecution by the public integrity section of the Justice Department has collapsed.
abstract: Mistrial in the federal campaign finance case against John Edwards marks yet another setback for the Justice Department's public integrity section; once-vaunted watchdog group has been trying to rebuild itself following a botched prosecution of Sen Ted Stevens in 2009.
lead_paragraph: The mistrial in the John Edwards case was the second time this year that a highly visible prosecution by the public integrity section of the Justice Department has collapsed.

headline.seo: Edwards Case a Setback for Justice Dept. Unit
headline.main: Another High-Profile Failure for a Justice Dept. Watchdog
headline.print_headline: Another High-Profile Failure for a Justice Dept. Watchdog

keywords.value: Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington
keywords.name: organizations
